lead_paragraph: McCARTHY--Anne Marie. Hometown Darien, CT on July 11, 2016. Born in Aalen, nestled in the "Schwabische Albs," Germany, she travelled from Germany on the SS Hanseatic to New York City. Anne Marie was a dedicated mother and friend. She generously shared family traditions through her baking and cooking, especially during holidays. She later met her husband, Eugene G. McCarthy, at the World's Fair. Daughter of Hildegard Marquart and Josef Gruner; dedicated mother of Debbie Sutton and Jim McCarthy; loving grandmother to Anna Kathleen and Seamus Eugene Sutton and Caitlin and Brendan McCarthy; sister to Peter, Herbert, Josef, Rolf, Fred and Christel. Donations may be made to MSKCC by calling Amanda Gilstein at 646-227-3709 to support ovarian cancer research. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCCARTHY, ANNE MARIE
